word:
Well, we mean to sow beside all waters. Some fruit may come of the seed sown. I prayed the Lord to open the way that I might find someone interested 


                                   -61- 

in the Desire of Ages, and then came this chance. It will keep me in touch with these island workers.--Letter 190, 1900, pp. 1-3. (September 6, 1900, on the steamer Moana, to "Dear Friends All in Cooranbong.") 

White Estate Washington, D. C. May 12, 1980
